CircusOfPlates
Class Plate

java.lang.Object
  CircusOfPlates.Plate
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable
public class Plate
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Externalizable

The Plate class that represents the logic for drawing and shifting the plate with the required attributes

Since:
JDK 1.6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mostafa Mahmod Mahmod Eweda
See Also:
RectangleShape, Serialized Form

Field Summary

             org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Point start,
             boolean LeftToRight)
Create a plate with the given attributes

Parameters:
color - the color of the Plate
start - the start point the plate should be moving from initially
LeftToRight - determines if the plate will be moving left to right or from right to left
